template.description: A template to set up date and time. This implementation is a temp solution to cover date/time set up for game_mode_config. Shoud be set in UTC time zone.

group.name: date
group.description: A part that sets up a date

int.name: month
int.description: Month of the year in numeric format

group.name: time
group.description: A group that sets up time in 24h format
